vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χρῡσό-πρᾰσος, ὁ,
chrysoprase, a precious stone of golden-green colour, [NT+1st c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
chrysoprase (an apple-green quartz)
a chrysoprase, a species of gem of a golden green color like that of a leek, Rev. 21:20*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: crisoprasa, cuarzo verde (piedra semipreciosa, variedad de cuarzo de color verdoso)
